Class-Alchemist 20 -- Female Skilled Human Alchemist: 20

Background: Artisan Deity: Nethys
Experience: 19481/20000 Level: 20 Speed: 30 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 9/14
Attribute Notes:
Attribute Boosts: Attribute Boost (Choose 20 from any)
Fleet: +5 Speed
Breath Control: Can hold breath for 225 rd without suffocating

Mutagenist: Has the Mutagenic Flashback feature
Research Field: 1 selection
Skill Feats: 10 selections
Familiar: May have a familiar

Acrobatics: +4 (dexterity; untrained) Heaven Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Piloting Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained)
Arcana: +4 (intelligence; untrained) Heraldry Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Ratfolk Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained)
Architecture Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Hunting Lore: +32 (intelligence; legendary) Religion: +4 (wisdom; untrained)
Athletics: +4 (strength; untrained) Intimidation: +25 (charisma; trained) Society: +4 (intelligence; untrained)
Baking Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Legal Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Stabling Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained)
Cavern Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Medicine: +4 (wisdom; untrained) Stealth: +26 (dexterity; trained)
Cooking Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Military Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Survival: +26 (wisdom; trained)

Skill Notes:
Additional Lore (Hunting Lore): Skill Legendary (Hunting Lore)
Additional Lore (Vampire Lore): Skill Legendary (Vampire Lore)
Advanced Efficient Alchemy: Has increased Advance Alchemy effects
Alchemical Crafting: Knows the formulas for 4 common 1st-level alchemical items
Alchemist Skills: Skill Trained (Crafting; Choose 7 from any)
Bomber: Knows the formulas for 2 common 1st-level bombs
Chirurgeon: Knows the formulas for 2 common 1st-level healing elixirs
Double Brew: Has increased Quick Alchemy effects
Efficient Alchemy: Has increased Advanced Alchemy effects
Intelligence Language Bonus: +4 Language Count
Mutagenist: Knows the formulas for 2 common 1st-level mutagens
Perception Expertise: Perception Expert
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 9 from any)
Skill Training (Ratfolk Lore): Skill Trained (Ratfolk Lore)
Skill Training (Stabling Lore): Skill Trained (Stabling Lore)
Skill Training (Swamp Lore): Skill Trained (Swamp Lore)
Skilled Human: Skill Expert (Choose 1 from any)
Abundant Vials: Has increased Perpetual Infusions effects
Advanced Alchemy: Can create 14 infused alchemical items of up to level 20 without a Crafting check during daily prep
Alchemical Assessment: Can use Crafting to Identify Alchemy in 1 action
Alchemical Crafting: Can use Crafting to create alchemical items
Alter Admixture: Can use a 10 min process to change the type of an alchemical bomb, elixir, or poison
Chirurgeon: Can use Crafting in place of Medicine
Clotting Elixirs: Healing elixirs allow a DC 10 flat check to remove any persistent bleed damage
Combine Elixirs: (F) Uses the ingredients of 2 elixirs to create a single elixir that has the effects of both
Craft Philosopher's Stone: Knows the formula for creating a philosopher's stone
Dubious Knowledge: Failure on a Recall Knowledge check yields a mix of true and false information
Efficient Alchemy: Can produce twice the usual number of alchemical items during downtime
Enduring Alchemy: Quick Alchemy products last until the end of the next turn
Eternal Elixir: Can indefinitely extend the duration of an elixir of up to level 10 that lasts at least 1 min
Experienced Professional: Critical failures when using Lore to Earn Income are normal failures, and normal failures give twice the income
Extend Elixir: Doubles the duration of elixirs that last at least 1 min
Formula Book: Has a book that contains at least 50 alchemical formulas
Fortified Elixirs: Consumer of an infused antidote or antiplague can end its effects to gain a reroll on a failed Fortitude save vs. poison or disease
Improbable Elixirs: Can create elixirs that replicate the effects of 4 potions of up to level 9
Improved Invigorating Elixir (Mental): Can make invigorating elixirs that counteract confused, controlled, fleeing, frightened, paralyzed, or slowed
Improved Invigorating Elixir (Physical): Can make invigorating elixirs that counteract blinded, deafened, drained, paralyzed, or slowed
Improvise Admixture: (1) Crafting check using an alchemist's toolkit provides 1, 2, or 3 versatile vials on a failure, success, or critical success once per day
Invigorating Elixir: Prepared elixir can be imbibed by sickened creatures and attempts to counteract imbiber's choice of clumsy, enfeebled, sickened, or stupefied
Legendary Professional: Improves NPCs' attitude by 1 step for those with ranks in Society/Increases the job level when Earning Income using Lore
Mutant Innervation: Cogntive mutagens boost Deception, Diplomacy, Intimidation, Medicine, Nature, Performance, Religion, and Survival and allow R60' telepathic communication; Serene mutagens negate detection, revelation, and scrying effects up to rank 9; Silvertongue mutagens negate circumstance penalties to Deception, Diplomacy, Intimidation, and Peformance and translate speech into listeners' languages
Mutant Physique: Bestial mutagens give an Intimidation bonus and increase claws and jaws damage die by 1 step and give them the deadly d10 trait; juggernaut mutagens give 10 physical damage resistance, and quicksilver mutagens give 10' Steps and Squeezing as one size smaller
Persistent Mutagen: Extends the duration of a mutagen until the next day once per day
Quick Alchemy: (1) Uses versatile vials to create 2 consumable alchemical items of up to level 20 that last for 1 turn
Quick Repair: Can Repair an item in 1 min
Research Field: Can use 1 batch of infused reagents to create 3 signature items
Soothing Vials: Versatile vial that restores Hit Points allows an immediate +1 Will saving throw to end 1 mental effect
Specialty Crafting: +1 Crafting on selected type of item
Tenacious Toxins: Increases duration of poisons by their stage 1 interval
Unmistakable Lore: Critical failures on any trained Lore are normal failures and critical successes on a Lore with master rank provide additional information
Unstable Concoction: Can increase the die size of the initial effects of a alchemical consumable by 1 step; the consumer suffers acid damage equal to the items level (DC 10 flat check negates)
Versatile Vials: Can create 10 versatile vials each day
Combat
Hit Points: 248 Armor Class: 41 (dexterity (1 max); master) Class DC: Alchemist: 26 (%1; %2)
Armor: Breastplate Shield: Wooden (+2 AC when raised; hardness 3; HP 12) Weapons: Gauntlet (+30 1d4+4 B; strength; master); Longspear (+30 1d8+4 P; strength; master); Spear (+30 1d6+4 P R20'; strength; master)
Combat Notes:
Alchemical Expertise: Class Expert (Alchemist)
Alchemical Mastery: Class Master (Alchemist)
Alchemical Weapon Expertise: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Alchemical Bombs)
Alchemical Weapon Mastery: Attack Master (Simple Weapons; Alchemical Bombs)
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +80
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Far Lobber: Thrown bombs have a 30' range
Medium Armor Expertise: Defense Expert (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Medium Armor Mastery: Defense Master (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +4
Uncanny Bombs: Thrown bombs have a 60' range
Unconventional Weaponry: Treats Blowgun as one category simpler
Blowgun Poisoner: Critical success with a poisoned blowgun Strike inflicts 1 degree worse on the save/Successful Stealth vs. Perception when using a blowgun allows remaining hidden or undetected
Bomber: Can direct a bomb splash onto a single target
Bounce Back: (F) Wounded condition does not increase when losing the dying condition once per day
Debilitating Bomb: (F) Creates a bomb of up to level 18 that also inflicts dazzled, deafened, flat-footed, or -5 Speed (DC 26 Fortitude negates) for 1 turn
Directional Bombs: Can restrict bomb splash effects to a 15' cone in direction thrown
Double Poison: Can apply 2 poisons of up to level 18 to a weapon simultaneously
Expanded Splash: Can throw bombs to inflict +4 HP splash damage in a 10' radius
Exploitive Bomb: (F) Creates a bombthat negates resistance 20
Field Discovery: Can use 1 batch of infused reagents create 3 items from research field
Greater Debilitating Bomb: Can use Debilitating Bomb to create bombs that also inflict clumsy 1, enfeebled 1, stupefied 1, or -10 Speed (DC 26 Fortitude negates) for 1 rd
Greater Field Discovery (Bomber): Can increase bomb splash radius to 15'
Greater Field Discovery (Chirurgeon): Created elixirs restore the maximum number of Hit Points
Greater Field Discovery (Mutagenist): Can use 2 polymorphic mutagens simultaneously
Healing Bomb: Successful ranged Strike with an elixir of life gives its effects to the target and restores Hit Points equal to the elixir's dice to adjacent creatures; failure restores Hit Points equal to the elixir's dice to the target only
Mega Bomb: (2) Thrown bomb of up to level 18 affects all creatures in a 30' radius (save basic Reflex DC 26)
Miracle Worker: Once every 10 min, can administer a true elixir of life that restores life with 1 HP and wounded 1 to a creature dead for up to 2 rd
Perfect Debilitation: Debilitating Bombs require a critical success to avoid effects
Pernicious Poison: Specially-prepared poison inflicts HP equal to its level if the target saves
Pinpoint Poisoner: Off-guard targets suffer -2 initial saves vs. self poisoned weapons and inhaled poisons
Powerful Alchemy: Increases DC for items created with Quick Alchemy to 26
Quick Bomber: (1) Draws or uses Quick Alchemy to create a bomb and Strikes with it
Revivifying Mutagen: (1) Ends mutagen effects to restore 1d6 Hit Points per 2 levels of the mutagen
Smoke Bomb: (F) Creates a bomb that also creates smoke in a 10'-radius burst for 1 min
Sticky Bomb: (F) Can create bombs that inflict persistent damage equal to their splash damage
Sticky Poison: Poisoned weapon remains poisoned for 1 rd after a Strike on a successful DC 17 flat check, or DC 5 if the Strike had no effect
True Debilitating Bomb: Can use Debilitating Bomb to create bombs that also inflict enfeebled 2, stupefied 2, or -15 Speed (DC 26 Fortitude negates)
Uncanny Bombs: Thrown bombs reduce target cover Armor Class bonus by 1 and succeed automatically on the flat check to target a concealed creature
Weapon Specialization: Inflicts +2, +3, and +4 HP damage with expert, master, and legendary weapon proficiency
Save: Fortitude: +30 (constitution; master); Reflex: +30 (dexterity; master); Will: +30 (wisdom; master)
Save Notes:
Canny Acumen (Will): Save Master (Will)
Chemical Hardiness: Save Master (Fortitude)
Explosion Dodger: Save Master (Reflex)
Will Expertise: Save Expert (Will)
Alchemical Revivification: If killed while under the effects of an elixir, returns to life next turn with the effects of a major bestial, juggernaut, or quicksilver mutagen
Breath Control: +1 vs. inhaled threats, and successes vs. inhaled threats are critical successes
Chemical Hardiness: Successes on Fortitude saves are critical successes
Explosion Dodger: Successes on Reflex saves are critical successes
Haughty Obstinacy: Successful saves vs. mental effects that control actions are critical successes, and foe Intimidation (Coerce) fails are critical fails
Stubborn Persistence: Can avoid fatigue with a successful DC 17 flat check
Notes
Validation Errors:
Alchemist Research Field Allocation: 1 available vs. 4 allocated
Class Feats Allocation: 11 available vs. 47 allocated
